BANNER.TITLE: Welcome to
BANNER.SUBTITLE: From zero to expert in Python: create your own projects from day one.

BENEFITS.TITLE: Python Benefits
BENEFITS.SUBTITLE: Discover why Python is the preferred language by developers worldwide.

EASY_LEARN.ICON_TITLE: Icon to represent ease of learning
EASY_LEARN.TITLE: Easy to Learn
EASY_LEARN.DESCRIPTION: Python has a simple and readable syntax that makes learning easy for beginners.

VERSATILITY.TITLE: Versatility
VERSATILITY.DESCRIPTION: Use it for web development, data science, artificial intelligence and automation.

COMMUNITY.ICON_TITLE: Icon to represent the large developer community
COMMUNITY.TITLE: Large Community
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Millions of developers and resources available to help you on your journey.

JOB_OPPORTUNITY.ICON_TITLE: Icon to represent high job demand
JOB_OPPORTUNITY.TITLE: Job Opportunities
JOB_OPPORTUNITY.DESCRIPTION: High demand in the job market with excellent salaries.

LIBRARIES.ICON_TITLE: Icon to represent access to python libraries
LIBRARIES.TITLE: Powerful Libraries
LIBRARIES.DESCRIPTION: Access to thousands of libraries that accelerate your development.

MULTIPLATFORM.ICON_TITLE: Icon to represent functionality across different platforms
MULTIPLATFORM.TITLE: Multiplatform
MULTIPLATFORM.DESCRIPTION: Run your code on Windows, Mac, Linux and more operating systems.

WHY_PYTHON.TITLE: Why learn Python?
WHY_PYTHON.SUBTITLE: Python is the most popular and versatile programming language in the world.

FUTURE_LANGUAGE.TITLE: Language of the Future
FUTURE_LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Python is the most demanded language in emerging technologies like AI, Machine Learning and Data Science.

INTUITIVE_SYNTAX.TITLE: Intuitive Syntax
INTUITIVE_SYNTAX.DESCRIPTION: Its code reads like natural English, reducing development time and facilitating maintenance.

ROBUST_ECOSYSTEM.TITLE: Robust Ecosystem
ROBUST_ECOSYSTEM.DESCRIPTION: It has more than 300,000 packages in PyPI that cover any development need.

WORK_AREAS.TITLE: Work Areas
WORK_AREAS.SUBTITLE: Python opens doors to multiple work areas with high job demand.
